definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Signal integrity analysis of high-speed digital circuit;
sentences.chinese: 在高速数字电路中，信号完整性问题至关重要。

sentences.english: The system digital circuit requirements are now reviewed and modified .
sentences.chinese: 现在需要对系统数字电路的要求进行分析和修改。

sentences.english: Fault simulation is an important part of ATPG.
sentences.chinese: 故障模拟是数字电路测试的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Analog and digital circuits with ultra-low power consumption can be widely used in many areas of applications.
sentences.chinese: 模拟与数字电路的超低功耗设计有着广泛的应用价值。

sentences.english: For digital circuits, "floating effect" can influence the speed characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 对于数字电路来说，浮体效应会影响他们的速度。

sentences.english: In most digital circuits (within  like  logic families), backward coupling of 10% or less is usually acceptable.
sentences.chinese: 大部分数字电路，10%的后端串扰是被允许的。

sentences.english: The extensive use of digital circuit has led to the development of integrated circuits .
sentences.chinese: 数字电路的广泛使用促进了集成电路的发展。

definition: abbr. for 光耦合器[guang1 ou3 he2 qi4]
